description.en: Completely reprinted!! A non-stop detective action comedy brought to you by Hisashi Sekiya. The Chief Car Detective is a car enthusiast and sportsman!! He takes on the case with his assistant Rokuta, Daisaku, his caretaker Hyoroku Old Man, and his lively quartet of pet Sanpei. Full throttle to solve the problem!! Contains the one-shot “Erase with the Grand Prix” at the same time!! Synopsis - A detective action story with humorous characters drawn by Hisashi Sekiya!! - Detective Shinsuke Kuruma is a car enthusiast and sportsman! Despite being the president of a company, he devotes himself to his family detective business as a side job. His companions are Rokuta, a boy who works at his own pace, the stubborn Old Man Hyoroku, and his pet lion, Sanpei, three and one! They have an adventurous spirit, and in front of the members of the Kuruma Detective Agency, they can solve any difficult case. Even mysterious cases are resolved at full speed! Commentary on "Good job! Hurray for Detective Chief!!'' Serialized in Shonen Gaho from 1964, "Banzai Detective Chief'' is a detective action work by Hisashi Sekiya, is. At the time of the serialization, there were many works in the detective action genre, but Hisashi Sekiya tried to differentiate it from other works by bringing in his specialties of sitcoms and racing depictions. This work, "Banzai Detective Chief'' is a remake of "Banzai Detective Chief'', which was serialized in "Weekly Shonen Magazine'' in 1963. You can see the author's passion for this work because it was remade in a short period of time (about half a year), which is unprecedented in the history of manga, and the illustrations have been rewritten while keeping the story the same!? In addition to recording all the stories of "Shonen Gaho'', it also includes the short story "Erase at the Grand Prix'' that was published in "Weekly Shonen King'' in 1968, making it a [complete version]. I want you to enjoy the thrill and humor brought to you by Hisashi Sekiya!!
